planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
action: If at cargo destination, deliver it. If cargo is illegal ship suffers 2 damage.
If no free cargo slots, buy a job card. Otherwise, buy a cargo card and place a goal token on card's destination.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. If at job destination, complete it.
c. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
d. If the planet you are on has faction, gain 1 reputation with that faction.
